title: Sales of the leading 15 optical retailers in the U.S. 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million U.S. dollars for 15 number of Optical retailers.
The Sales in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Optical retailer Vision Source and lowest at Optical retailer Emerging Vision Inc..
The Sales in million U.S. dollars of Optical retailer Emerging Vision Inc. is 25.72% smaller than the maximum value at Vision Source.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Optical retailer in the x axis and Sales in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Sales in million U.S. dollars is highest at Optical retailer Vision Source and lowest at Optical retailer Emerging Vision Inc..
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million U.S. dollars for 15 number of Optical retailers.
The Sales in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Optical retailer Vision Source and lowest at Optical retailer Emerging Vision Inc..
The Sales in million U.S. dollars of Optical retailer Emerging Vision Inc. is 25.72% smaller than the maximum value at Vision Source.
max_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Optical retailer, and Sales in million U.S. dollars in each Optical retailer on the y axis.
The maximum Sales in million U.S. dollars 2840.0 is found at Optical retailer Vision Source and the minimum is found at Emerging Vision Inc. where Optical retailer is 110.4.
The second highest Sales in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the Optical retailer Luxottica retail.
The Sales in million U.S. dollars of Optical retailer Vision Source is 25.72% larger than the minimum value at Emerging Vision Inc..
Sales in million U.S. dollars at Optical retailer Vision Source is 2840.0 , second place is Luxottica retail at 2470.0, and thirdly is Walmart stores at 1762.0.
The Optical retailer Emerging Vision Inc. has 3.25 times less Sales in million U.S. dollars than average.
The Sales in million U.S. dollars is 13099.1 if we add up values of all Optical retailers.
